april.util
Class ParameterGUI

java.lang.Object
  java.awt.Component
      java.awt.Container
          javax.swing.JComponent
              javax.swing.JPanel
                  april.util.ParameterGUI
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.awt.image.ImageObserver, java.awt.MenuContainer, java.io.Serializable, javax.accessibility.Accessible
public class ParameterGUI
extends javax.swing.JPanel

Provides a means of easily and rapidly manipulating parameters. Parameters typically have a shortname (which is passed to the parameterListener) and a description (which is displayed to the user.) By default, ParameterListeners are notified only in response to USER GENERATED* messages: calls to the set methods should not result in callbacks. This behavior can be changed by calling setNotifyOnSet().

See Also:
Serialized Form

getPanel

public java.awt.Component getPanel()
Deprecated.

setNotifyOnSet

public void setNotifyOnSet(boolean e)
If set to true, calls to a set method (ss, sd, si, etc.) will result in callbacks on the ParameterListeners. When set to false, only user interactions with the GUI widgets generate callbacks. The default behavior is false (only user interactions generate callbacks).

main

public static void main(java.lang.String[] args)
